sentences.en: ...people who invest in 10- and 20- and 30-year Treasuries.
sentences.cn: …10年、20年和30年期国库券的投资者。

sentences.en: Among the speakers at the gathering was Treasury Secretary Nicholas Brady.
sentences.cn: 与会的发言人中有财政部长尼古拉斯·布莱迪。

sentences.en: His tone poems are a treasury of orchestral discoveries.
sentences.cn: 他的音乐诗是管弦乐作品的宝库.

sentences.en: Our other white knight was G. William Miller , secretary of the treasury.
sentences.cn: 我们的另一位白衣骑士是财政部长G · 威廉·米勒.

sentences.en: Sir John was definitely in the Treasury's bad books for incorrect thinking on economic prospects.
sentences.cn: 约翰爵士肯定不受财政部的待见，因为他对经济前景的预测并不准确。

sentences.en: Some wonder if his campaign advisers may have a formal role, perhaps in the key job of treasury secretary.
sentences.cn: 有人想知道，他的竞选顾问是否可以得到正式的职位，也许是关键的财政部长的职位。

sentences.en: The authorities believe there is a mole at the Treasury.
sentences.cn: 当局认为财政部里有内奸.

sentences.en: The insurance company will take warehouse stocks or treasury bonds as surety.
sentences.cn: 该保险公司将接受仓库库存货物或长期国库券作为担保。

sentences.en: The Treasury had been blaming the pound's weakness on the backwash from the falling dollar.
sentences.cn: 财政部一直将英镑的疲软归咎于美元贬值。

sentences.en: The Treasury has long been predicting an upturn in consumer spending.
sentences.cn: 财政部早就预测消费者支出会出现上扬。

sentences.en: The Treasury has now agreed to ring-fence the money to ensure that it goes directly towards helping elderly people.
sentences.cn: 财政部现在已经同意限制这笔钱的用途，以保证其直接用于帮助老年人。

sentences.en: The treasury of the baseball club is as empty as ever.
sentences.cn: 棒球俱乐部的资金仍然空如往昔.

sentences.en: The Treasury was opposed in principle to the proposals.
sentences.cn: 财政部原则上反对这些提案.

sentences.en: The Treasury will never agree to expand the secret vote.
sentences.cn: 财政部决不会同意增加秘密经费.

sentences.en: Theoretically he had control over more than $400 million in US accounts. But, in fact, it was the US Treasury and State Department who controlled those accounts.
sentences.cn: 从理论上说，他掌管着美国账户里的4亿美元。然而，事实上，是美国财政部和国务院在掌控那些账户。

sentences.en: There was a note of caution for the Treasury in the figures.
sentences.cn: 统计数字向财政部亮出了警告。

sentences.en: We voted to pay for the party out of the club treasury.
sentences.cn: 我们议决宴会费用由会中公款开支.

words.tran_cn: 会计；司库；财务主管；出纳员
[财政]国库，[金融]金库；财政部；宝库

phrases.tran_cn: （美国财政部发行的5年期以上的）长期国库券

trans.tran_cn: 国库，金库，（政府的）财政部，宝库，宝藏，贮藏所，库房
trans.tran_en: a place in a castle, church,  palace  etc where money or valuable objects are kept
